item.title: Smashing Minesweeper For Fun And Profit: The Timer (Part 1)
item.description: 0. Introduction All Windows users around the early 2000s should probably know it. It shipped with every copy of Windows XP and some other versions. I’m talking about the puzzle game Minesweeper. If you’re not familiar with this game you can lookup the gameplay mechanics here. Basically you are presented with a AxB sized grid divided into cells. Mines are scattered throughout the board. You have to uncover all non-mined cells.
